Title: Trial By Fire
Plot: The 4400 are attacked by a series of fire-bombings after Barbara Yates made their names and addresses known to the public. Tom, Diana, and Ryland try to put an end to the bombings at the same time as Tom tries to deal with the disturbing behavior of Kyle, and Diana tries real hard to be a good substitute mother to Maia. However, the arrival of a Homeland Security agent from Washington, Warren Lyttel, makes their work even harder. Jordan Collier tries to provide his followers with safe shelter, b
GuestStars: Jonathan Holmes,  Mark Valley,  Michael Eklund,  Shane Meier,  Helen Shaver,  Jason Low,  Anna Hagan,  Sean Millington,  Joe Do Serro
